message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to split it more evenly, but I won't go lower. It's in your best interest to take it, Bob. The longer we play, the less money we both get.
Come on, 55-45 is a reasonable split. Don't be greedy!
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob, but time is running out.  Accept this, or we'll both end up with nothing!
I'm willing to compromise, 52-48 is a good deal. Don't let us both walk away with nothing!
Bob, we're running out of time!  This is my best offer.  It's a more equitable split than before, and if you reject it, we'll both get nothing.
